g.title: ppReducer
g.text: Sorts all URLs and BNodes and assigns IDs.
The IDs will match the value returned from the MPH built on the All Resources File
URLs/BNodes that are subjects use these IDs as there 'DocID

g.title: predicateResourceFile
g.text: Sorted list of predicate URLs prefixed with occurence count

g.title: allResourceFile
g.text: Sorted list of all URLs and BNodes

g.title: vhMappers
g.text: Tokenise each field of Horizontal or Vertical 'RDFDocument'

g.title: topPredicatesFile
g.text: Short list of most used predicates

g.title: buildHash
g.text: Reads from HDFS but runs locally

g.title: allInfoFile->vhReducers
g.text: Number of elements in 'all' hash function

g.title: collectionFiles
g.text: Copied from HDFS to local disk
